AI Description: SVABA is a structural variation (SV) detection tool that identifies complex genomic rearrangements from sequencing data including tumor-normal comparisons. It is designed to capture deletions, insertions, inversions, duplications, and translocations in a wide range of organisms.
Core Features: Identification Of Structural Variations (Svs), Analysis Of Complex Genomic Rearrangements, Detection Of Deletions, Insertions, Inversions, Duplications, & Translocations, Tumor-Normal Comparison
General Tags: Structural Variation Detection, Genomic Rearrangement Analysis, Tumor-Normal Comparison
